Rt2_assignment1’s documentation!

This is the documentation of the RT1 assignment

goto_rt3 Module

This node recive the user input from ui_rt3 and relay the position to move_base. Also, when the action return the status, this node will print out the result.

Action(s): /move_base

Service(s): /activate_goto

scripts.goto_rt3.activate_ = False

state of node (True/False). True means the node is enabled to control the robot goal.

Type

Boolean

scripts.goto_rt3.client_ = None

Client side service handeler (between ui_rt3 and goto_rt3

scripts.goto_rt3.done_cb(status, result)[source]

Function for printing the state of move_base Args: status(int): State of move_base result(int): Result of move_base Returns: -

scripts.goto_rt3.go_to_switch(req)[source]

Function for enable/disable this module Args: req(ROS service): State of goto_rt3 Returns: res(ROS service): Response msg

scripts.goto_rt3.main()[source]

This function initializes the ROS node action and service. After initialization, this function waiting for the trigger from ui_rt3 (via service (activate_goto)) Then, starting relay the information to move_base. The user message is passed to the service move_base.

ui_rt3 Module

This node recieve the mode of the robot from user (1 for automatic navigation, 2 for control robot using teleop_twist_keyboard 3 for using teleop_twist_keyboard to control the robot with assistance). Mode 1 going to take the co-ordinate of goal position and convey to goto_rt3 node. Mode 2 and mode 3 going to pass the values from teleop_twist_keyboard with/without correction to simulatio environment.

Publisher(s): /cmd_vel

Subscriber(s): /scan /cmd_vel_kb

Service(s): /activate_goto

scripts.ui_rt3.able_to_move_ = [0, 0, 0, 0, 0]

Consists of status of each zone (left, front-left, front, front-right, right)

Type

Int

Type

(5 x 1 array)

scripts.ui_rt3.check_obstruc(regions, key, index)[source]

Function for check obstructcal by using laser scanner and assign in to occupancy list. Args: regions(dictionary): dictionary of laser scanner in each direction key(string): key for regions index(int): indexing of occupancy list

scripts.ui_rt3.clbk_laser(msg)[source]

Callback function for laser scanner. this function will be called when the msg from laser scanner has been published Args: msg(dictionary): data from lase scanner

scripts.ui_rt3.mode_ = 0

mode of the robot

Type

Int

scripts.ui_rt3.obstacle_detection_range = 1

varible for defining the range of detection for assisted control.

Type

Int

scripts.ui_rt3.pub_cmd_vel_ = None

Publisher handeler for conveying the information to simulation

Type

Publisher

scripts.ui_rt3.srv_activate_goto_ = None

Service hadler between ui_rt3 -> goto_rt3

Type

Service

scripts.ui_rt3.sub_cmd_vel_kb_ = None

Subscriber handeler for teleop_twist_keyboard

Type

Subscriber

scripts.ui_rt3.sub_laser_ = None

Subscriber handeler for lase scanner

Type

Subscriber

scripts.ui_rt3.vel_msg = linear:    x: 0.0   y: 0.0   z: 0.0 angular:    x: 0.0   y: 0.0   z: 0.0

Information of robot

Type

Twist
